title: BITCH (takes one to know one)
lyrics:
You said it like a joke
Everything gets blurry
You don’t even know
How am I gonna compromise?
I know you won’t apologise
You sent me down the river

To see if I would float away



How dare you for laughing at me when I’m crying

So tell me why, tell me why



You do the things you do, oh God

You know what they say

Takes a bitch to know a bitch, bitch

Takes a bitch to know a bitch, bitch

You’re acting like you’re innocent

You know what they say

Takes a bitch to know a bitch, bitch

Takes a bitch to know a bitch, bitch



You walk into the party

You’re laughing with our friends

You make it look so easy

But I just can’t pretend

How can you act like everything’s aright?

I don't know how I'm gonna sleep tonight

You made my mind so heavy

Somebody take this weight away



How dare you for laughing at me when I’m crying

So tell me why, tell me why



You do the things you do, oh God

You know what they say

Takes a bitch to know a bitch, bitch

Takes a bitch to know a bitch, bitch

You’re acting like you’re innocent

You know what they say

Takes a bitch to know a bitch, bitch

Takes a bitch to know a bitch, bitch



I'm about to lose my my my my mind

You should give in when you talk talk talk talk to me

(So tell me why, tell me why)



You do the things you do, oh God

You know what they say

Takes a bitch to know a bitch, bitch

Takes a bitch to know a bitch, bitch

You do the things you do, oh God

You know what they say

Takes a bitch to know a bitch, bitch

Takes a bitch to know a bitch, bitch



You do the things you do, oh God

Takes a bitch to know a bitch, bitch

Takes a bitch to know a bitch, bitch

You do the things you do, oh God

You know what they say

Takes a bitch to know a bitch, bitch

Takes a bitch to know a bitch, bitch
